translation_credits: Put your name here on your respective language's file if you've translated!

invalid_text.title: Your MCMETA rules are invalid!
invalid_text.description: Common errors include not double-quoting property key names or misplacing a character.

invalid_file.title: Invalid MCMETA file!
invalid_file.description: No `animation` property was found on the file. Please check that you uploaded the correct file.

missing_profile.title: %USER% has no contributions!
missing_profile.description: No database profile was found for this user.
missing_profile.register: Register at https://webapp.faithfulpack.net to get accurate contribution information and credits.

reflip.title: Coin re-flipped!
reflip.description: If you don't get the result you want, try, try again...

unbannable.title: This user cannot be botbanned!
unbannable.description: You cannot botban yourself, a developer, or someone with administrator permissions.

embed.need_more_info: You need to have either a description or title for an embed.

info.title: Hi, I'm CompliBot. I was made for the Faithful Discord servers.
info.subtitle: And I think I turned out pretty well.

features.title: Features
features.description:
- Real-time texture interaction using `/texture`, `/compare`, and `/cycle`.
- Check resource pack progress with `/missing` or check your contributions with `/contributions`.
- Image manipulation utilities such as `/magnify`, `/tile`, `/palette`, and `/animate`.

developing.title: Developing
developing.description:
I'm fully open source (written in TypeScript and Discord.js) and can be cloned at my GitHub repository [here](https://github.com/faithful-resource-pack/complibot).

If you're interested in developing, contact <@473860522710794250>, <@360249987927638016>, or <@173336582265241601> for more information.
